about.title: RisingSun
about.subtitle: What falls — must rise again
description: Amid uncertainty and chaos, only the way of the warrior can triumph. In the fiery pits of the Binance Smart Chain, a token was born: RisingSun.

With a safe contract and proven tokenomics, RisingSun has all the tenets of the Bushidō code. Featuring an auto buyback mechanism known as the Samurai Engine, everything is in place to uphold the honor of your investment. In a world full of doubts, there is only one certainty: the Rising Sun.
By joining the RisingSun nation, holders are uniting around an ideal: what falls — must rise again.

engine.title: Samurai Engine
engine.subtitle: Catchy subtitle
description: The Samurai Engine is the first-ever intelligent buyback system. The engine utilizes price feeds and quantitative trading algorithms to trigger buybacks at dips in price. The engine will help maintain healthy price action, rewarding long-term holders.

items.title: Holder Snapshots
description: Diamond-handed holders will get unique NFT's! Periodic holder snapshots will differentiate the strong from the weak. Stay tuned for special NFT artwork.

items.title: Reduced Tax
description: For every 2000 holders with minimum ~$10 tokens, the sell tax is reduced by 1% until the sell tax reaches 8%. The longer you hold, the better sell tax you get.

items.title: Auto Reflection
description: 2% BUSD Reflection means you lock-in gains from holding. Volume makes you only richer. The strong-willed become stronger.
